content: None of the solutions on the right solve the problem. If anyone is looking lets get it resolved.
creator: tincanman

content:
For hvc.rr.com accounts, Spectrum suggests:

incoming IMAP mail.twc.com, 993, SSL/TLS, normal password, email address

outgoing SMTP mail.twc.com, 587, STARTTLS, normal password, email address

Post your settings to compare.
creator: sfhowes

content:
You should use https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/new/thunderbird instead of https://support.mozilla.org/bm/questions/new/thunderbird

The bm is abbreviation for Bamanankan.

You can also use https://support.mozilla.org/questions/new/thunderbird and will likely default to https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/new/thunderbird for you.
creator: James

content: Workaround: first login in your trusted Chrome browser. And don't stop to think how your login leaks from trusted Chrome to Thunderbird.
creator: firefox.com.yes.really

content:
Hi,

I am writing to report a critical issue with Thunderbird email client synchronization for our Thunderbird email account, upshaw.uic77@upshaw.ph.

I have confirmed that the same issues are occurring when accessing the email through webmail.

Please see the attached screenshots from both webmail and Thunderbird, which demonstrate the following errors:

1. Email Synchronization: Emails and sent items are not updated for the year 2022 and this month, October 2024. The synchronization is incomplete. 2. Email Contacts: Our email contacts are missing. The contacts displayed in the screenshot are outdated.

This issue is causing significant disruption to our communication and workflow. We urgently request your assistance in resolving this problem.


Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,

Kean
creator: keancabling.upshaw

Hello there

If you are having trouble with message treading turn on that back up button first be sure to have that backup before things could get worse on them computers.

Using the subject treading view is a automatic deal that comes with the update and configuration versions from Thunderbird itself auto treading it is ,there automatic turned on in Thunderbird .

In the past the option was you could turn it on or off was there a option for manually. In the later versions it could be configured with newer functions and columns to choose for that function yes or no or the possible functions for on and off.

What version do you use of Thunderbird ?can I ask?

The latest version that was available ?oke. Did you downloaded the version from a trusted site?

https://www.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/releases/

Oké if the back up is there, oké. Try to as ,a answer on the question here to go to the menu for this function and manually turn the option on or off in the program or do it with the newer options exactly the same the method s are always the same for this subject.

Is there a problem with the functions to turn them to turn it on or off?

Is it stuck?


Greetings Firefox volunteer

content:
Hello there

If the Thunderbird version is Oke . You can enable treading on a folder. Disable treading on that folder of u. Applying threads to a newer or other folder. And changing default treating method or mode on other maps .

All this function s does not affect other functions when in use of them treating methods.

I try to solve the issue here ,hopely I did send you in the right direction of that.

content:
Informazioni utili da fornire nelle richieste di supporto:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
creator: @next

content:
Hebt u uw e-mail opnieuw moeten instellen? Zo ja, dan is dat een indicatie dat er een ander profiel is aangemaakt, wat weer een indicatie voor twee versies van Thunderbird naast elkaar is. Mogelijk dat het nieuwe profiel maar twee weken terugkijkt via IMAP, terwijl u voorheen alles kon bekijken (of zelfs de account als POP had ingesteld?).

Wat bedoelt u precies met ‘Misschien heb ik abusievelijk een verkeerde versie aangeklikt’? Hebt u een nieuwe versie geïnstalleerd vanaf de website van Thunderbird?
creator: markh2

content:
Aggiungo, se può aiutare, che mi compare questo messaggio: La cartella “Posta in arrivo su ...........@katamail.com” non può essere compattata in quanto non è possibile scriverci. Verificare di avere spazio su disco sufficiente e avere privilegi in scrittura, quindi riprovare.

Lo spazio ovviamente c'è, si tratta di una nuova installazione con un centinaio di GB liberi. Per quanto riguarda i privilegi in scrittura, ho dato il controllo completo della cartella e delle sottocartelle a tutti gli utenti, ma il problema permane.
